cz.cuni.mff.kocur.bot

Class BaseBotController

  • java.lang.Object
    • cz.cuni.mff.kocur.bot.BaseBotController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    BotController, ConfigurationChangeListener, Controllable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Lina, Sniper, TestBot

    public abstract class BaseBotController
extends java.lang.Object
implements Controllable, BotController, ConfigurationChangeListener
    Abstract class that implements some of the methods every bot should supply. Also registers logger for root class of registered bot -> so for all packages with the same package path. Defines and handles bot id and creates bot information. Defines basic responses every bot can make. (Move, Attack, Buy, Sell)
    Author:
    Banzindun

      • updateHero

        public void updateHero(Hero h)
        Description copied from interface: BotController
        Updates our hero. We want to keep the reference pointing at the same object, so that controllers etc. don't need to ask for a hero reference every tick.
        Specified by:
        updateHero in interface BotController
        Parameters:
        h - Hero that with it's id corresponds to our hero.
